    • Method Detail

      • get

        public Drive.About.Get get()
                    throws java.io.IOException
        Gets information about the user, the user's Drive, and system capabilities. Create a request for the method "about.get". This request holds the parameters needed by the drive server. After setting any optional parameters, call the AbstractGoogleClientRequest.execute() method to invoke the remote operation.
        Returns:
        the request
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
